Messages.Message: Oliver! What are you doing here!?
I've been looking all over for you. What were you thinking?
I...thought that this would feel right. But it is so lonely. Ghosts don't even really talk to each other.
Well...why don't you just "haunt" me so that we can hang out?
Ha! That's not a bad idea at all!
Good. Now that that's over with, let's go scare someone.
Sounds like a plan. Thanks for finding me, Oliver.
